title: Cranberry chicken salad
ingredients: ['2 cooked chicken breast fillets, chopped', '125ml mayonnaise or to taste', '2 spring onions, chopped', '60g sweetened dried cranberries', '1/4 green apple, grated', '4 tablespoons chopped pecans', '1 tablespoon lime juice', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon dried dill']
